title: KAU Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for GYM Instructor Post
description: The Kerala Agriculture University (KAU) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Gym Instructor Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Diploma or any Degree can grab this chance and apply for the KAU Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. If y...
